thread.title: It’s the Oscars, let’s get drunk! (13 GIFS)
thread.title_full: It’s the Oscars, let’s get drunk! (13 GIFS)

author: Kayla
title: It’s the Oscars, let’s get drunk! (13 GIFS)
text:
1 GIF 
The Oscars mark the end of awards season and while some of us could care less, other people live and die for this kind of stuff. It doesn’t matter where you fall on the spectrum of giving a shit, we can all agree the best way to watch the Oscars is with a drink in hand. 
To maximize your drinking experience try out this Oscars drinking game tonight. If my calculations are correct, you should be obliterated by the end of the evening considering the show lasts around three hours. Tune in at 7 p.m. EST on ABC to get the party started. 2 
Drink every time a celebrity wears something hideous on the red carpet. 3 
Take a shot when a movie wins that you’ve never seen. 4 
Drink when someone gets political during their acceptance speech. 5 
Drink every time the camera pans to a celebrity making a weird face. Advertisement
